programme.title: Maid in Manhattan
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Jennifer Lopez and Ralph Fiennes. Senatorial candidate Christopher Marshall falls for Manhattan hotel maid Marisa Ventura after mistaking her for a socialite. Desperate to hide her humble roots, Marisa sets up an elaborate game of pretence Wayne Wang - Director, Wayne Wang - Director Jennifer Lopez - Marisa Ventura Ralph Fiennes - Christopher Marshall Natasha Richardson - Caroline Lane Stanley Tucci - Jerry Siegel Bob Hoskins - Lionel Bloch Tyler Garcia Posey - Ty Ventura Frances Conroy - Paula Burns Chris Eigeman - John Bextrum Marissa Matrone - Stephanie Kehoe Amy Sedaris - Rachel Hoffberg Priscilla Lopez - Veronica Ventura Jennifer Lopez - Marisa Ventura Ralph Fiennes - Christopher Marshall Natasha Richardson - Caroline Lane Stanley Tucci - Jerry Siegel Bob Hoskins - Lionel Bloch Tyler Garcia Posey - Ty Ventura Frances Conroy - Paula Burns Chris Eigeman - John Bextrum Marissa Matrone - Stephanie Kehoe Amy Sedaris - Rachel Hoffberg Priscilla Lopez - Veronica Ventura.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: Wartime comedy starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey. While scratching around Kuwait in search of a story about the Iraq war, reporter Bob Wilton meets Lyn Cassady, who claims to be a member of an experimental military unit that uses psychic powers to read the enemy's thoughts, can pass through solid walls and even kill a goat by staring at it. Cassady confides that he's on a secret mission, and heads into Iraq accompanied by the sceptical Wilton Grant Heslov - Director, Grant Heslov - Director George Clooney - Lyn Cassady Ewan McGregor - Bob Wilton Jeff Bridges - Bill Django Kevin Spacey - Larry Hooper Stephen Lang - Brigadier General Dean Hopgood Nick Offerman - Scotty Mercer Robert Patrick - Todd Nixon Rebecca Mader - Debora Wilton Stephen Root - Gus Lacey George Clooney - Lyn Cassady Ewan McGregor - Bob Wilton Jeff Bridges - Bill Django Kevin Spacey - Larry Hooper Stephen Lang - Brigadier General Dean Hopgood Nick Offerman - Scotty Mercer Robert Patrick - Todd Nixon Rebecca Mader - Debora Wilton Stephen Root - Gus Lacey.

programme.title: Bad Neighbours

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: Comedy fantasy starring Bill Murray and Andie MacDowell. Cynical TV weatherman Phil Connors is sent to cover the annual Groundhog Day festival at a small town in Pennsylvania. programme.title: The Cinema List: The 90s
programme.desc: Alex Zane and celebrity film fans go back to the 90s to celebrate some of the decade's greatest films, from classic comedies to epic blockbusters.

programme.title: Field of Dreams
programme.desc: Fantasy drama starring Kevin Costner, Amy Madigan and Ray Liotta. Ray Kinsella, an unfulfilled Iowa farmer, hears a mysterious voice that inspires him to build a baseball field on his land, to the consternation of his family and neighbours. But when the ghost of his late father's hero - disgraced player "Shoeless" Joe Jackson - appears, Ray embarks on a magical journey of discovery Phil Alden Robinson - Director, Phil Alden Robinson - Director Kevin Costner - Ray Kinsella Amy Madigan - Annie Kinsella Gaby Hoffmann - Karin Kinsella Ray Liotta - \Shoeless\ Joe Jackson Timothy Busfield - Mark James Earl Jones - Terence Mann Burt Lancaster - Dr \Moonlight\ Graham Frank Whaley - Archie Graham Dwier Brown - John Kinsella James Andelin - Feed store farmer Kevin Costner - Ray Kinsella Amy Madigan - Annie Kinsella Gaby Hoffmann - Karin Kinsella Ray Liotta - \Shoeless\ Joe Jackson Timothy Busfield - Mark James Earl Jones - Terence Mann Burt Lancaster - Dr \Moonlight\ Graham Frank Whaley - Archie Graham Dwier Brown - John Kinsella James Andelin - Feed store farmer.

programme.title: Goodfellas
programme.sub-title: Documentary And Factual, Drama, Crime/detective, Thriller ║ 1990 ║ 18
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese's crime drama, starring Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta and Joe Pesci. In 1950s New York, Irish-Italian schoolboy Henry Hill dreams of becoming a gangster and lands a job parking cars for the Mob. Having earned the respect of the local Mafia boss, he is teamed with hitmen James Conway and Tommy DeVito. But as the years pass, Hill finds his allegiance to the Mob challenged as he descends deeper into organised crime Martin Scorsese - Director, Martin Scorsese - Director Robert De Niro - James Conway Ray Liotta - Henry Hill Joe Pesci - Tommy DeVito Lorraine Bracco - Karen Hill Paul Sorvino - Paul Cicero Frank Sivero - Frankie Carbone Tony Darrow - Sonny Bunz Mike Starr - Frenchy Frank Vincent - Billy Batts Chuck Low - Morris Kessler Catherine Scorsese - Tommy's mother Frank DiLeo - Tuddy Cicero Henny Youngman - Henny Youngman Gina Mastrogiacomo - Janice Rossi Charles Scorsese - Vinnie Suzanne Shepherd - Karen's mother Debi Mazar - Sandy Samuel L Jackson - Stacks Michael Imperioli - Spider Robert De Niro - James Conway Ray Liotta - Henry Hill Joe Pesci - Tommy DeVito Lorraine Bracco - Karen Hill Paul Sorvino - Paul Cicero Frank Sivero - Frankie Carbone Tony Darrow - Sonny Bunz Mike Starr - Frenchy Frank Vincent - Billy Batts Chuck Low - Morris Kessler Catherine Scorsese - Tommy's mother Frank DiLeo - Tuddy Cicero Henny Youngman - Henny Youngman Gina Mastrogiacomo - Janice Rossi Charles Scorsese - Vinnie Suzanne Shepherd - Karen's mother Debi Mazar - Sandy Samuel L Jackson - Stacks Michael Imperioli - Spider.

programme.title: King Ralph
programme.desc: Comedy starring John Goodman, Peter O'Toole and John Hurt. When the cream of the British monarchy is tragically wiped out, the dregs of the royal line produce an unexpected new heir to the throne: Las Vegas lounge singer Ralph Jones. programme.title: Addams Family Values
programme.desc: Comedy horror starring Anjelica Huston and Raul Julia. Sharing it with her friends Linda and Susan, the rejuvenated women waste little time in painting the town red, but they soon realise it's a very different world to the one they remember. programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: Wartime comedy starring George Clooney, Ewan McGregor, Jeff Bridges and Kevin Spacey. While scratching around Kuwait in search of a story about the Iraq war, reporter Bob Wilton meets Lyn Cassady, who claims to be a member of an experimental military unit that uses psychic powers to read the enemy's thoughts, can pass through solid walls and even kill a goat by staring at it. programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. Upon arrival, a confused Henry discovers the reason behind the popularity - Mexican translator Maria has rewritten the dull book as a steamy erotic story. A furious Henry and reluctant Maria must now travel together on a book tour across Mexico. As tempers flair and sparks fly, the two begin to find love. Romantic comedy, starring Sam Claflin and Veronica Echegui Robert Shaye - Director, Robert Shaye - Director, Robert Shaye - Director, Robert Shaye - Director.

programme.title: Confess, Fletch
programme.desc: Freelance journalist Fletch arrives in Boston from Rome at the request of recent love interest Angela de Grassi. Her father has been kidnapped by three thugs, and the ransom is the family's stolen Picasso painting, which is reportedly in the possession of art dealer Ronald Horan. However, Fletch soon becomes prime suspect in a murder case as he tries to rescue the abducted dad. When she reconnects with her childhood crush, she is confronted with fundamental questions about her potential for love, happiness, friendship and hope - all while trying to solve a mystery surrounding a fugitive billionaire. programme.title: The Exorcist: Believer
programme.desc: Single parent Victor Fielding raises his daughter Angela, 13 years after the death of his pregnant wife in a Haitian earthquake. He is alarmed when Angela and her friend Katherine vanish in the woods and return three days later with no memory of their ordeal. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.title: UTD Podcast: Steve Coppell: Part 1
programme.desc: Steve looked back on his dream debut, the FA Cup finals he played in and his conversations with Sir Matt Busby.

programme.title: UTD Podcast: Steve Coppell: Part 2
programme.desc: Steve looks back on his remarkable record of 207 consecutive games for the club and tells us why he doesn't think that achievement will ever be beaten.

programme.title: Official UTD Podcast: Graeme Hogg
programme.desc: The Scotsman looked back on his fondest moment in red; a historic second-leg comeback win over Barcelona at Old Trafford, where he proudly stated he had Diego Maradona in his back pocket.

programme.title: Official UTD Podcast: Henning Berg
programme.desc: The Norwegian told us how a move to Man Utd nearly materialised years before his eventual arrival, but fell apart due to a work permit issue. He also recalled his worst hairdryer from the boss.

programme.title: Official UTD Podcast - Nick Cox
programme.desc: Nick talked us through a day in the life of his role; with pressures and responsibilities involved in continuing the club's rich history in youth delevopment.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Darron Gibson
programme.desc: Following a recent leg break, Darron announced his retirement on the podcast and felt it would be a good time to reflect on his Premier League career.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Eric Djemba-Djemba
programme.desc: The tough-tackling midfielder looked back on the moment where he and Cristiano Ronaldo came off the bench together at Old Trafford, and the words they exchanged before crossing the white line.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Mikael Silvestre
programme.desc: The former France international looked back on a glittering career at Old Trafford, and picked out some of his highligths from working with both Sir Alex Ferguson and later, Arsene Wenger at Arsenal.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Paul Woolston

programme.desc: The former United winger reflected on the iconic night at Wembley, where he picked up the Man of the Match Award alongside his winners' medal.

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Valdez v Wilson
programme.desc: A doubleheader in Arizona pits Oscar Valdez against Liam Wilson in a super-featherweight battle, while Seniesa Estrada takes on Yokasta Valle for the undisputed minimumweight title. (30.03).

programme.title: Monaco F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: On the streets of Monte Carlo, the one-of-a-kind Monaco Grand Prix arrives, as the 2024 field of Formula 1 stars push their way through 78 laps of tight bends and narrow chicanes. (26.05).

programme.title: Indycar Highlights
programme.desc: At Indianapolis Motor Speedway, one of the spectacles in motorsport unfolds as pole-sitter Scott McLaughlin attempts to join racing immortality with victory at the Indianapolis 500. (26.05).

programme.title: Fight Night: Beterbiev v Smith
programme.desc: In Quebec City, Callum Smith stands across the ring from Artur Beterbiev as the Liverpudlian attempts to topple the unified light heavyweight champion of the world. (13.01).

programme.title: World Club Challenge Hlts
programme.desc: In the Betfred World Club Challenge, Wigan Warriors host NRL Premiers Penrith Panthers at the DW Stadium in one of club rugby league's biggest encounters. (24.02).

programme.title: R/Lge Retro: St Helens V Brisbane
programme.desc: Look back at a thriller at Reebok Stadium, as Super League champions St Helens face NRL Premiers Brisbane for the right to be crowned champions of the world.

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: The 5-2 Detroit Lions host the 3-4 Las Vegas Raiders in week eight of the NFL. The NFC North leaders Detroit were bested last week by a Lamar Jackson-inspired Baltimore Ravens. (30.10).

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the 2024 Charles Schwab Challenge on the PGA Tour, held at Colonial Country Club in Fort Worth, Texas. The Argentine Emiliano Grillo won here in 2023.

programme.title: DP World Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: The fourth and final round of the Soudal Open at Rinkven International Golf Club in Antwerp, Belgium. Simon Forsstrom registered his one and only DP World Tour win here in 2023. (26.05).

programme.title: Best of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Los Angeles Chargers battle the Chicago Bears in week eight of the 2023 NFL. Rookie quarterback Tyson Bagent clawed the Bears to victory last week, improving their record to 2-5. (29.10).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Valdez v Wilson
programme.desc: A doubleheader in Arizona pits Oscar Valdez against Liam Wilson in a super-featherweight battle, while Seniesa Estrada takes on Yokasta Valle for the undisputed minimumweight title. (30.03).

programme.title: WS/Lge: St Helens v Leeds
programme.desc: Action from the Betfred Women's Super League, as St Helens and Leeds Rhinos clash at the Totally Wicked Stadium. After three played, it's Leeds Rhinos who boast the perfect record. (24.05).

programme.title: S/Lge: St Helens v Leeds Hlts
programme.desc: St Helens host Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League. The Saints were in rampant mood during round 11's clash with Castleford, pulling off an incredible 4-60 victory. (24.05).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Loma v Kambosos
programme.desc: In his quest to recapture a world title, Ukraine's legendary Vasiliy Lomachenko travels to Perth to face Australia's George Kambosos for the vacant IBF lightweight championship. (12.05).

programme.title: Fight Night: Rozanski v Okolie
programme.desc: The WBC world bridgerweight championship is on the line as Lawrence Okolie makes his long-awaited return to challenge Lukasz Rozanski at the Podpromie Arena in Rzeszow, Poland. (24.05).

programme.title: Monaco F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: On the streets of Monte Carlo, the one-of-a-kind Monaco Grand Prix arrives, as the 2024 field of Formula 1 stars push their way through 78 laps of tight bends and narrow chicanes. (26.05).

programme.desc: St Helens host Leeds Rhinos in the Betfred Super League. The Saints were in rampant mood during round 11's clash with Castleford, pulling off an incredible 4-60 victory. (24.05).

programme.desc: Lancaster Country Club in Pennsylvania stages the 79th US Women's Open, as round one of this Major championship previously won by Allisen Corpuz gets underway. (30.05).

programme.title: Indycar Highlights
programme.desc: At Indianapolis Motor Speedway, one of the spectacles in motorsport unfolds as pole-sitter Scott McLaughlin attempts to join racing immortality with victory at the Indianapolis 500. (26.05).

programme.title: S/Lge: Catalans v Warrington Hlts
programme.desc: Unbeaten at home, Catalans Dragons host Warrington Wolves in the Betfred Super League. Third-placed Warrington take back-to-back league wins to the south of France. (25.05).

programme.title: WS/Lge: St Helens v Leeds
programme.desc: Action from the Betfred Women's Super League, as St Helens and Leeds Rhinos clash at the Totally Wicked Stadium. After three played, it's Leeds Rhinos who boast the perfect record. (24.05).

programme.desc: Lancaster Country Club in Pennsylvania stages the 79th US Women's Open, as round one of this Major championship previously won by Allisen Corpuz gets underway. (30.05).

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: A week eight contest from the 2023 NFL, as the San Francisco 49ers host a 3-3 Cincinnati. For just the second time in two years, the Niners are carrying a two-game losing streak. (29.10).

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Fresh from sending the Bills home in the divisional round, Patrick Mahomes and the Kansas City Chiefs return to the AFC championship game as they face the Ravens in Baltimore. (28.01).

programme.title: Fight Night: Lopez v Ortiz
programme.desc: Teofimo Lopez puts his WBO super-lightweight crown on the line in Las Vegas as Jamaine Ortiz challenges the 26-year-old American in what will be his first world title shot. (09.02).

programme.title: U.S Women's Open Golf Round 2 Hlts
programme.desc: Lancaster Country Club in Pennsylvania stages the 79th US Women's Open, as round one of this Major championship previously won by Allisen Corpuz gets underway. (30.05).

programme.title: IPL Qualifier 1: KKR v SRH Hlts
programme.desc: The IPL enters the playoffs as KKR face Sunrisers Hyderabad in the Qualifier. The winner books a ticket to the final while the loser gets another chance in the second Qualifier. (21.05).

programme.title: IPL Eliminator: RR v RCB Hlts
programme.desc: The IPL playoffs continue as Ahmedabad stages an Eliminator between Rajasthan Royals and RCB. The winner here will advance to the second Qualifier, while the loser goes home. (22.05).

programme.title: IPL Q2: SRH v Rajasthan R Hlts
programme.desc: The IPL playoffs continue as Chennai stages the sudden-death second Qualifier between Hyderabad and Rajasthan, with the winner advancing to the final and the loser going home. (24.05).

programme.title: IPL Final: KKR v SRH Hlts
programme.desc: Two teams at the forefront of a batting revolution this season meet in the final, as Kolkata Knight Riders take on Sunrisers Hyderabad in Chennai to crown the 2024 IPL champions. (26.05).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Foster v Nova
programme.desc: The Theater at Madison Square Garden sets the scene for a WBC super-featherweight title defence, as the champion O'Shaquie Foster goes toe to toe with Abraham Nova for 12 rounds. (17.02).

programme.title: Fight Night: Rozanski v Okolie
programme.desc: The WBC world bridgerweight championship is on the line as Lawrence Okolie makes his long-awaited return to challenge Lukasz Rozanski at the Podpromie Arena in Rzeszow, Poland. (24.05).

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: The New York Jets meet Los Angeles Chargers in week nine of the 2023 NFL. The Jets staged an unlikely comeback to stun the Giants with a 13-10 victory during week eight. (06.11).

programme.title: LIVE: U.S Women's Open Golf Round 2
programme.desc: Lancaster Country Club in Pennsylvania stages the 79th US Women's Open, as round two of this Major championship previously won by Allisen Corpuz gets underway. (31.05).

programme.title: PL Darts: London Finals Night
programme.desc: With £275,000 up for grabs, Luke Littler, Luke Humphries, Michael van Gerwen and Michael Smith contest the 2024 BetMGM Premier League Darts play-offs at London's O2 Arena. (23.05).

programme.title: MVG v Wade: Premier Lge 2015
programme.desc: Revisit a classic Premier League Darts contest from the Motorpoint Arena where Michael Van Gerwen dismantled James Wade in 2015 with an average of 116.90. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: Taylor v Mason 2002
programme.desc: In a match that saw the first-ever televised nine-darter, revisit this classic contest between Phil Taylor and Chris Mason at the 2002 World Matchplay. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: PDC Classics 2023
programme.desc: Relive this incredible encounter, that included two nine-darters, between James Wade and Phil Taylor at Wembley Arena in the 2010 Premier League final. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: PDC Classics 2023
programme.desc: In a classic at the World Matchplay in July 2011, Simon Whitlock let a seemingly unassailable lead slip when Andy Hamilton recovered from a 15-8 deficit. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: LIVE: Live UEFA Champions League
programme.sub-title: S2023E170 ║ Live: UEFA Champions League Final ║ Sport
programme.desc: Borussia Dortmund v Real Madrid (Kick-off 8.00pm). Coverage of this year's final from Wembley Stadium, as the Carlo Ancelotti's side look to win their 15th title. The Spanish club have won this competition seven times this century, including five wins in the last 10 years. Their last victory came two years ago when they beat Liverpool 1-0. Their opponents are chasing only their second ever Champions League title, after their last win came in 1997.
